channel.title: ::switch
channel.description: Could anyone code ,me a switch command?

item.title: ::switch
item.dc:creator: @range_p00nz range p00nz
item.description:
@range_p00nz wrote:

if (command.startsWith("switch")) { NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You switch to normal magic."); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You switch to ancient magick."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: ::switch
item.dc:creator: @Demi_Sphere Demi Sphere
item.description:
@Demi_Sphere wrote:

Re: ::switch
« Reply #1 on: Today at 03:10:02 PM » Quote

if (command.startsWith(“switch”))
{
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
animation(435, absY, absX);
RemoveAllWindows();
if (ancients == 1)
{
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 0;
sendMessage(“You switch to normal magic.”);
}
else
{
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 1;
sendMessage(“You switch to ancient magick.”);
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: ::switch
item.dc:creator: @Moparsuck Moparsuck
item.description:
@Moparsuck wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“switch”))
{
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
animation(435, absY, absX);
RemoveAllWindows();
if (ancients == 1)
{
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 0;
sendMessage(“Ur now at Normal Magicks!”);
}
else
{
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 1;
sendMessage(“Ur now at Ancient Barrage Magicks!”);
}
}
